channel.title: Video on Rusty Eddy
channel.description: Recent content in Video on Rusty Eddy

item.title: Streaming Video Protocols
item.description: RTSP What it is and How to use it Real Time Streaming Protocol (RTSP) This test I used raspivid to vlc to stream from my Raspberry Pi Camera, I used the following command retrieved from here ```bash % raspivid -o - -t 0 |cvlc -v stream:///dev/stdin –sout ‘#rtp{sdp=rtsp://:8554/}’ :demux=h264
